text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.title: 動態音樂配置（ 停在選項上）
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.sear: Number of blocks in each direction. 5 = 10^3. 0 disables cave music.
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.dark: Light level of blocks used for cave detection.
Percent of blocks with low light levels to trigger cave detection
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.ston: Percent of stone to trigger cave detection
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.pseu: Number of blocks in each direction. 2 = 4^3. 0 disables.
Percent of mineshaft blocks for mineshaft detection
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.cold: Play cold music in cold biomes
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.hotM: Play hot music in hot biomes
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.nice: Play nice music during the day
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.down: Play down/sad music during the night
text.autoconfig.dynamicmusic.option.dyna: The closer the time is to the Anchor, the slower the music plays
The anchor that the Dynamic Pitch uses. 18000 being midnight
選擇播放音樂更快，而不是更慢
